VideoOverlay.prepare

Function/Meaning
Prepare playback
Type
Method of the VideoOverlay class
Syntax
prepare()
Arguments
None
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Draws the first frame of the media to the specified layer and triggers an onPeriod event when drawing is complete. After calling the prepare method, please wait for the onPeriod event before starting playback.
Reference
VideoOverlay.onPeriod
